sections.name: Zombie Mammoths
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Mindless
traits.text: A mindless creature has either programmed or rudimentary mental attributes. Most, if not all, of their mental attribute modifiers are –5. They are immune to all mental effects.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with void energy and soul-corrupting unholy magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by vitality energy and are healed by void energy, and don’t benefit from healing vitality effects.

traits.name: Zombie
traits.text: These undead are mindless rotting corpses that hunger for living flesh.

interaction_abilities.name: Slow
interaction_abilities.text: A zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

universal_monster_ability.name: Negative Healing
universal_monster_ability.text: A creature with negative healing draws health from negative energy rather than positive energy. It is damaged by positive damage and is not healed by positive healing effects. It does not take negative damage, and it is healed by negative effects that heal undead.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: This weapon can be used to attack enemies up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent enemies. For creatures with reach, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: This weapon can be used to attack enemies up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent enemies. For creatures with reach, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: This weapon can be used to attack enemies up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent enemies. For creatures with reach, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Dual Tusks
ability.text: The zombie mammoth makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the mammoth's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

ability.name: Grabbing Trunk
ability.text: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the zombie mammoth's trunk is grabbed. If the mammoth moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.

ability.name: Impaling Tusks
ability.text: The zombie mammoth makes a tusk Strike against a creature it's grabbing with its trunk. If the attack hits, the creature is impaled upon one of the mammoth's tusks, freeing the trunk to make attacks. Each of the mammoth's tusks can hold two Medium or smaller creatures. A mammoth can attack with its tusks while creatures are impaled upon them.
